step1.desc: Join the MRModPack Discord server and download the mod from #üëë„Éªmrmodpack

Step2.desc: Unpack the zip file (do not open the folder!).

Step3.desc: Open extensions panel in your browser (about://extensions)

Step4.desc: Turn on developer mode to be able to load extensions.

Step5.desc: Add the unpacked MRModPack to extensions. You can do this by clicking load unpacked, then searching mod folder or by move and drop

thumbsdb.h1: Cannot load extension with file Thumbs.db (or other)
thumbsdb.desc: Your operating system generated a Thumbs.db file, which usually happens when there are photos in a folder and a preview is shown. You can‚Äôt have this file while adding mod folder as a extension, to fix that: Find MRModPack folder, open it and find file named Thumbs.db. If you dont see this file, enable Hide elemtents, in View tab in your explorer.

manifest.desc: This error won‚Äôt break anything, it tells us that manifest version 2 is no longer supported. Everyone sees this error for now, so you do not have to worry, MRModPack will be working fine :)

en.mobile: MRModPack works only on pc, come back on a computer.
